<title level="2" right="Creature 20">[Rinnarv Bontimar](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1589)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 24</row>

**Perception** +32; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +32, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +38, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +38, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +34, [Hermea Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +32, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +34, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +38

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +7

**Con** +8

**Int** +3

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +10
</row>

**Items**
[_circlet of persuasion_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=400), _+3 [major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [elven curve blade](/Weapons.aspx?ID=50)_, _+2 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 45 

**Fort** +36 

**Ref** +33 

**Will** +30 

</row>

**HP** 400

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> Rinnarv can use Attack of Opportunity when a creature within his reach uses a [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) action, in addition to its normal trigger. He can disrupt triggering concentrate actions, and he disrupts actions on any hit, not just a critical hit.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_elven curve blade_ +38 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 4d8+24 slashing

**Divine Spontaneous Spells** DC 42, attack +38
- **Cantrips (10th)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=171)*, [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Bless](/Spells.aspx?ID=25), [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)*, [Protection](/Spells.aspx?ID=238) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Darkvision](/Spells.aspx?ID=60), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), [_spiritual weapon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=306)*
- **3rd**
[Circle of Protection](/Spells.aspx?ID=38), [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)*, [Heroism](/Spells.aspx?ID=149), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [_searing light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=269)*, [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) (4 slots)
- **4th**
[Dimensional Anchor](/Spells.aspx?ID=70), [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86)*, [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)*, [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Spell Immunity](/Spells.aspx?ID=296), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) (4 slots)
- **5th**
[Breath of Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=29), [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86)*, [Drop Dead](/Spells.aspx?ID=92), [_flame strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=120)*, [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)*, [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Spiritual Guardian](/Spells.aspx?ID=305), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) (4 slots)
- **6th**
[_blade barrier_](/Spells.aspx?ID=24)*, [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86)*, [Field of Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=114), [Repulsion](/Spells.aspx?ID=254), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Spiritual Guardian](/Spells.aspx?ID=305), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) (4 slots)
- **7th**
[_blade barrier_](/Spells.aspx?ID=24)*
, [Dimensional Lock](/Spells.aspx?ID=71), [_divine decree_](/Spells.aspx?ID=82)*, [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86)*, [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)*, [Regenerate](/Spells.aspx?ID=248), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Spiritual Guardian](/Spells.aspx?ID=305), [Sunburst](/Spells.aspx?ID=326), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) (4 slots)
- **8th**
[_blade barrier_](/Spells.aspx?ID=24)*
, [Discern Location](/Spells.aspx?ID=75), [_divine aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=81)*, [Divine Inspiration](/Spells.aspx?ID=83), [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86)*, [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)*, [Moment of Renewal](/Spells.aspx?ID=201), [Regenerate](/Spells.aspx?ID=248), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Spiritual Guardian](/Spells.aspx?ID=305), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) (4 slots)
- **9th**
[_blade barrier_](/Spells.aspx?ID=24)*
, [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86)*, [_foresight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=127)*, [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)*, [Massacre](/Spells.aspx?ID=186), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Spiritual Guardian](/Spells.aspx?ID=305), [Telepathic Demand](/Spells.aspx?ID=336), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354), [Weapon of Judgment](/Spells.aspx?ID=372) (4 slots)
- **10th**
[Miracle](/Spells.aspx?ID=196), [Revival](/Spells.aspx?ID=262) (2 slots)

**Bloodline Spells** DC 42, 3 Focus Points
- **10th**
[Angelic Halo](/Spells.aspx?ID=494), [Angelic Wings](/Spells.aspx?ID=495), [Celestial Brand](/Spells.aspx?ID=497)

**Blood Magic**   When Rinnarv casts one of his bloodline spells or a spell from his list of granted spells, he creates an aura that protects himself or one of the targets of the spell. The aura grants a +1 status bonus to saving throws for 1 round.

**Spell Strike** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Trigger** Rinnarv begins to Cast a Spell that targets at least 1 creature; **Effect** Rinnarv channels his spell through his blade. He makes a Strike with his blade against a target within reach. If the Strike is successful, the target is automatically subject to the spell. If the spell required an attack roll, the target is hit. If the spell required a saving throw, the target takes a –4 status penalty to its saving throw instead. If the spell could target multiple creatures, it targets only the creature Rinnarv hit with his Strike.

</column>
